member.name: Matrix3x2F.Determinant
member.summary: Calculates the determinant of the matrix.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Invert
member.summary: Inverts the matrix, if it is invertible.
member.returns: true if the matrix was inverted; otherwise, false.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.IsIdentity
member.summary: Indicates whether this matrix is the identity matrix.
member.returns: true if the matrix is an identity matrix; otherwise, false.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.IsInvertible
member.summary: Indicates whether the matrix is invertible.
member.returns: true if the matrix is invertible; otherwise, false.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Matrix3x2F
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the Matrix3x2F class that contains the specified values.
member.param: The value in the first row and first column of the matrix.
The value in the first row and second column of the matrix.
The value in the second row and first column of the matrix.
The value in the second row and second column of the matrix.
The value in the third row and first column of the matrix.
The value in the third row and second column of the matrix.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Matrix3x2F
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the Matrix3x2F class without initializing the matrix values.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.ReinterpretBaseType
member.summary: Converts the specified D2D1_MATRIX_3X2_F matrix to a Matrix3x2F without making a copy.
member.param: The matrix to convert.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.ReinterpretBaseType
member.summary: Converts the specified D2D1_MATRIX_3X2_F matrix to a Matrix3x2F without making a copy.
member.param: The matrix to convert.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Rotation
member.summary: Creates a rotation transformation that has the specified angle and center point.
member.param: The rotation angle in degrees. A positive angle creates a clockwise rotation, and a negative angle creates a counterclockwise rotation.
The point about which the rotation is performed.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Scale
member.summary: Creates a scale transformation that has the specified scale factors and center point.
member.param: The x-axis and y-axis scale factors of the scale transformation.
The point about which the scale is performed.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Scale
member.summary: Creates a scale transformation that has the specified scale factors and center point.
member.param: The x-axis scale factor of the scale transformation.
The y-axis scale factor of the scale transformation.
The point about which the scale is performed.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.SetProduct
member.summary: Multiplies the two matrices and stores the result in this matrix.
member.param: The first matrix to multiply.
The second matrix to multiply.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Skew
member.summary: Creates a skew transformation that has the specified x-axis and y-axis values and center point.
member.param: The x-axis skew angle, which is measured in degrees counterclockwise from the y-axis.
The y-axis skew angle, which is measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis.
The point about which the skew is performed.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.TransformPoint
member.summary: Uses this matrix to transform the specified point and returns the result.
member.param: The point to transform.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Translation
member.summary: Creates a translation transformation that has the specified x and y displacements.
member.param: The distance to translate along the x-axis and the y-axis.
member.returns: A transformation matrix that translates an object the specified horizontal and vertical distance.

member.name: Matrix3x2F.Translation
member.summary: Creates a translation transformation that has the specified x and y displacements.
member.param: The distance to translate along the x-axis.
The distance to translate along the y-axis.
member.returns: A transformation matrix that translates an object the specified horizontal and vertical distance.
